name: whatsapp-send
description: Send messages to WhatsApp contacts and groups
author: cyclop-team
steps: Use the native WhatsApp app (already open) — do NOT use web.whatsapp.com
To find a chat or group: click the search bar at top, type the EXACT name given in the command
Click the matching result — do NOT assume any name refers to saved-messages or self-chat
If not found in main search: try the New Chat button (pencil icon) and search there
Once chat is open: message input at bottom IS already focused — use type_text DIRECTLY without clicking first
If type_text fails (nothing typed): THEN click the input area once and retry
After typing: press Enter or Return to send
